titleStmt.title: SII 7.402: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 402. (A.R. No. 192 of 1901). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti ci . koṟcaṭaiyapaṉmarāṉa tirupuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ Emmaṇṭalamum koṇṭaruḷiya śrīcuntara
pāṇṭiyatevaṟkkuy yāṇṭu patiṉoṉṟāvatukku Etirāmāṇṭai Āṭimātam IrupattuEḻān tiyati ceyaṅckoṇṭaṇṭacoḻa
maṇṭalattu Ūṟṟukāṭṭukkoṭṭattu tiraiyaṉūrāṉa śrīkolottuṅkacoḻacaturppetimaṅkalattu mācapaiyom Uṭaiyār tiruvaṉa
nticcuramuṭaiya nāyaṉār koyil Āṇṭārcattiyatevar muṉṉāḷ ceyta tarmmakkāriyattukku perumāṉmutalikaḷil Uṭaiyar Ati
yamāṉār tirumuṉnāka nāṭavar tiraṇṭu Iruntu keṭṭu Ikkāriyattukku Uṭaiyār tiruvaṉanticcuramuṭaiya nā
yaṉāṟkku tevatāṉammāka Ikkoyil niyātittār Eṅkaḷpakkal tu nilakkāṇiyāka muṉṉāḷil koṇṭu Uṭaiya nila
ttile vi kaṭavatāka niccayitta nilam EḻuveliIṉāl pāṭakam nāṟpattiraṇṭukku vaṭak lai Uttamacoḻavatikku teṟkku
mummuṭicoḻavāykkālukku vaṭakku 8 2catirattu vāṇarāyaṉmuttai pāṭakam Oṉṟum vatikku kiḻakku 7
muṉṟāñ catirattu ceḻiyataraiyaṉ kūrattāṉ pāṭakam 1 1/8lum 6catirattu kiḷimaṅkalamuṭaiyāṉ kallaṉ pāṭakam 1va�lum
kaṭamparāyaṉ kallaṉ pāṭakam 1valum 8 3catirattu kāṅkaiyaṉ kallaṉ pāṭakam Oṉṟum makatarāyaṉ kallaṉ paāṭākam Oṉṟum
2catirattu virakaṅkaṉ kaṟiAmutuvaṭṭam pāṭakam 1m vāṇarāyaṉ kaṟiAmutupavaṭṭam pāṭakam 1m AmmaiAppamārāyaṉ
kaṟiyamutuvaṭṭam pāṭakam 1m kāṅkaiyaṉ pallāpurattānum Akkārakuṇṭilum pāṭakam kan=tataka 1 5catirattu nāccikkaḻuval pāṭakam 1m 10 6catirattu I
ruṅkoḷan Ettacceṟu pāṭakam 1m nallāḷ Ettacceṟu pāṭakam ��m 10 4catirattu kāliṅkarāyaṉ moṇvāymukkar pāṭakam 3/4m Araciṅka ṟṟuvatikku kiḻakku mummuṭicoḻavāykkālukku vaṭakku 1 6catirattu campantaṉ cāntūrāṉa naṭuvaṭaipāṭakam Oṉṟum 2 1catirattu tiruvekampamuṭaiyāṉ pāṭakam Oṉṟum mātirippiḷḷai pāṭakam Oṉṟum 8catirattu tiruppukkuḻivaṭṭam pāṭakam Oṉṟum 2 5catirattu naraciṅkapaṉmar coṉmukkar pāṭakam 3/4lum nantipaṉmaṉ e pāṭakam catirattu naraciṅkapaṉma m 1vam mutali pāṭakam 1vam 3 5catirattu Apayattāṉ pāṭakam Arai celvapeṇ pāṭakam 1m 4 8
catirattu Āvattaṉ Āṇṭāṉvaṭṭam pāṭakam Oṉṟum 2 8catirattu Āvattaṉ Irutaḷaiyaṉ pāṭakam Oṉṟum 4 7catirattu tiruppukkuḻi Uppūrāṉ gakaṉapaṭṭapiḷḷai Āvattaṉ Uppūrā yum 6catirattu piritiyaṅkaraiyaṉ pāṭakam 2ṇṭum vattarāyaṉpāṭakam Oṉṟum vaṭivuṭaiyāḷ pāṭakam Oṉṟum 5catirattu kāḷattiāṇṭār pāṭakam Oṉṟum 4catirattu tāḻippiḷḷaipāṭakam mukkālum makatarāyan Arumpāṭakam Oṉṟekālum 5 4catirattu naṉtipaṉmaṉ Attimu 1 3/4m 6catirattu Atiyamāṉ teṟkaṭaiya pāṭakam 1�m 6 8catirattu paḷḷiAṟaaiṉācci pāṭakam 1m 7catirattu Irāciṅkapaṉmaṉ pāṭakam 1m 6catirattu pe
rumāṇāyan pāṭakam 1m tevāṇṭai pāṭakam 1m 5catirattu Āṇṭār Īcāṉatevar pāṭakam 1m Aṟamaḷattāṉ pāṭakam Araiyum Ākap pāṭakam nāṟpattiraṇṭum Iṉnāyaṉārkku kuṭinīṅkāttevatāṉamāka viṭṭom Iṉnilattāl varum tiruvātiraineyyum Iṉnāyaṉārkku ĀṭiAruḷa viṭṭom tiraiyaṉūrāṉa śrīkulottuṅkacoḻacaturvvetimaṅgalattu mahāsabhaiyom Ippaṭikku Ivai paṇiyāl tiraiyaṉūrruṭaiyāṉ Eḻuttu .
